title: PLS UNBREAK REK'SAI
body:
Rek'sai rite now is reasonably weak, her 1v1 is alright, however when playing her it fells like you are playing with only half a kit, the attack speed on her ult is nice, but the active is meh. Her traps are easily spotted and are just stomped on. You could argue that you could just e on her side of the jungle, however what is the point, the chance to have her e anywhere near a potential ult victim is non-existent. So, rito... you should make her e untargetable and maybe reduce the duration and give her ult a movement speed steroid or attack damage steroid. 
thanks

replies.body: Its day 1, you probably don't know how to utilize her to her full potential.
Yep, this is a pointless complaint. Reminds me of when Gnar was released and everyone complained about how he weak he was on the Forums. Silly people.

Please give it some time. You cannot expect to play her like a God on the first day she has come out. That would be like having a baby coming out of the womb and expecting it to know French, English and Spanish, play the violin and know quantum mechanics all whilst riding a unicycle and eating a popsicle.
